details: Updated GitHub Copilot references in documentation and instructions (e.g., "Copilot Chat" → "GitHub Copilot").
Enhanced type safety: replaced `any` with `unknown` or specific types across multiple files (e.g., `CTAParams`, AJV errors).
Improved error handling and refactored AJV validation in `cta-builder.ts`.
Added type annotations and fixed type issues in tests and middleware (e.g., `liquid-helpers.ts`, `get-automatic-request-logger.ts`).
Updated CLI instructions for escaping backticks consistently.
